item.title: Aes in CBC mode
item.description: AES-CBC | I still see penguins I think this was a very experimental exercise. edit: I did something dumb, spent more time than i’d care to admit in agony before realising the dumb thing, hence this post exists. Scroll to the bottom to save yourself some pain. Task (cryptopals set2 challenge 11): Write an encryption oracle with encrypts a plaintext with AES in ECB mode half the time and CBC mode other half.
